details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.18 Annotations - 7.18.4 Forms - Widget annotation
details.description: If the Form element omits a Role attribute (Table 348), it shall have only one child: an object reference (14.7.4.3) identifying the widget annotation per ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.5, Table 340.
